alert.note: Alert for Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 07 at 6:12PM PDT until May 07 at 6:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central Lander County in north central Nevada... * Until 645 PM PDT. * At 611 PM PDT, a dust channel was 23 miles northeast of New Pass Summit, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Satellite and Nevada Department of Transportaion Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Mount Callaghan. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
